segments.text: Good morning . what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm looking for some earrings for my wife as a wedding anniversary gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've come to the right store . We've got a beautiful and wide selection of earrings for you to choose from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw a pair of earrings outside your window . Can you show them to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mean the exquisite pearl earrings ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly . How much do you want for them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is this setting made of ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's specially made of a platinum alloy , sir , and the lustre will never fade out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'II take them . Please wrap them up tor me and give me the receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've made an excellent choice , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
